unnormalised: Personally, for my cricket training back in college at St. Stephen's (Delhi), our coach had us on a brutal schedule. It involved batting practice for 2 hours, then fielding drills followed by running 10 km. We did that five days a week! We'd also have specific net sessions focusing on facing spin, especially prepping for inter-college tournaments. Remember those days, Rohan and Preeti? Good times (though felt like torture back then!).
